#summary Required libraries
#labels Phase-Requirements,Featured

= Base Requirements =

 * GWT 1.5 or better
 * Java 1.5 or better

= Template System = 

 * [http://xom.nu/ XOM 1.1] - `xom-1.1.jar`
 * [http://xerces.apache.org/xerces2-j/ Xerces] 2.6.1+; other SAX-compliant parsers may work

= Server-side Localization =

 * [http://www.csg.is.titech.ac.jp/~chiba/javassist/ javassist] I'm using 3.4.0, I haven't tested any earlier versions

= GWT to EJB bridge =

 * Requires the Java EE jars for servlets and annotations be on the class path; setting this up depends on your container and your IDE.

= Analytics = 

To use analytics you'll have to put the Google Analytics or Clicky tracking code into the page hosting your GWT application.
